title: Sam Harris vs. Noam Chomsky
description:
On episode one of the Inquiri.us Podcast, Max Seijo and Justin Bailey discuss a conversation between neuroscientist and author Sam Harris and noted foreign policy thinker and academic Noam Chomsky.
